name: Melon Demon Island
description:
I made this game for GBJAM 8 as my first completed game. It's a fairly short and simple action platformer focused on exploring. Collect watermelon slices and smash watermelon demons. At some point I plan to add controller support, but for now I didn't have time if I wanted to meet the game jam deadline. Sorry!

CREDITS:

Daydream Sound (daydreamsound.com) - Did most of the audio for the game.

Patrick de Arteaga (patrickdearteaga.com) - The music for the castle and boss fight were downloaded from their website.

Codeman38 (zone38.net) - Created the font I got from dafont.com for the game.

CONTROLS

Left and right arrow keys - Move left and right

X key - Jump

Z key - Attack with baseball bat

Collect all the watermelon slices to progress, grab life burgers to restore your health, and don't die. Good luck, and have fun!
